creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: seated figure wearing sumptuous purple, green, gold brocade robe; seated near center of image facing LR; holding string of gold rosary in both hands; exaggerated facial features, large eyebrows; several missing teeth; golden halo behind head; incense vessel and vase with flowers at PL; landscape of bamboo, a rock with cascading water, and a branch behind PR
markings: LLC, square red relief seal 一信之印
medium: Ink, color, and gold on silk
title: Seated arhat with rosary, one of a pair
